title: cmd/gc: internal compiler error: newname nil
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
See contents of the attached ZIP file.

2. What is the full compiler output?
cmd/cmd.go:2: internal compiler error: newname nil
cmd/cmd.go:2: internal compiler error: fault

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
8g version weekly.2012-01-15 11253
Attachments: 1. a.zip (2658 bytes)
